page.title: 05VILLAGE SHOP AND BUILDER
page.content: On one side of the Colchester to Mersea road is a row of 12 bungalows, 2 semi-detached houses and a small {shop.}This is the only shop in the area. There is no post office or telephone box or church, doctor, fire station, police or any other service in Langenhoe. The{shop}has been run by one person for 37 years. They sell most things and deliver goods and newspapers. Children buy sweets on their way home from school. There is a{builders}next to the school. He employs 6 men and mostly works at repairing buildings such as schools, fire stations and houses. He is always in our school, repairing the drains and pipes and roof. He builds a few houses. His firm used to be an undertakers as well and also mended farm machinery.
